txt_rellena_tu_contras: Fill in your password and verification of it. Please provide a security phrase below if you need it, it is optional.
txt_disclaimer_max_chars: * (min 8 - max 24 characters, 1 number and one uppercase)
txt_crea_tu_pista: Create your clue phrase to remember your password (optional)
txt_la_frase_no_superar: The phrase must not exceed 255 characters
txt_contener_minimo: It must contain at least 8 characters, 1 number and 1 uppercase
txt_exito_operacion: Your password manager is already created
txt_posible_operacion: Ya puedes acceder a tu espacio con tus credenciales, para ello pulsa en Acceder
txt_noposible_operacion: No ha sido posible llevar a cabo la operación, por favor inténtalo más tarde o pulsa en Cancelar proceso para volver a intentarlo
